thread.title: Michael Meacher, veteran Labour MP for Oldham West and Royton, dies aged 75
thread.title_full: Michael Meacher, veteran Labour MP for Oldham West and Royton, dies aged 75 - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Michael Meacher, veteran Labour MP for Oldham West and Royton, dies aged 75
text:
Sakho no longer feels like a caged lion. Credit: Reuters Something tickled captain Milner. Credit: Reuters Klopp seemed to enjoy himself as well. Credit: Reuters It was smiles and tongues all round as Liverpool trained on Wednesday morning ahead of this week's Europa League action.
The Reds welcome Rubin Kazan to Anfield on Thursday evening for Klopp's first European fixture in charge since replacing Brendan Rodgers.
Sport Football Liverpool FC
